name: DVD Video Screensaver
description:
So, you like staring at the DVDVideo Savescreen, waiting until the icon hits a corner? You came to the right spot.

This is the best recreation you can have!

This recreation aims to recreate the screensaver not as how it was, but as you remember it!

The recreation features:

  • Four corners, at perfect 90 degree angle!
  • Over 16 colors
  • It's free! You don't need to buy a DVD player!
